channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- postgresql init script
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- postgresql init script

item.title: CVE-2017-15097|2024-08-05T19:50:16.051Z -- red%20hat -- postgresql%20init%20script
item.description: Privilege escalation flaws were found in the Red Hat initialization scripts of PostgreSQL. An attacker with access to the postgres user account could use these flaws to obtain root access on the server machine.
